listing.provisionerUrl: The Provisioner is configured with the following URL:
listing.bannedIp: Your IP {{ip}} is banned, you can wait until ban expires or

restart.label: Restart
restart.disabled: It appears that this device doesn't exist in the platform anymore, or isn't registered, so we won't be able to send a Restart request for this device

settings.settingsNotSupported: Settings not supported for this device

text.line1: This tool checks to see if an IP address is blocked from provisioning due to abuse or other issues.
text.line2: Please enter the public IP address that the phone sits on.
text.line3: Note: 192.168.X.X or 10.X.X.X IPs are NOT public IPs, please enter only public IP addresses. Ask your IT administrator for help if you need it.

banned.label: Banned
banned.tooltip: This IP is temporarily banned because someone tried to load a config file manually, repeatedly tried to provision phones that weren’t yet in our system, or a few other reasons. This ban will automatically be removed in X minutes, at which point you can try again.

blacklist.label: Blacklisted
blacklist.tooltip: This IP is permanently blacklisted. To be removed from the blacklist, please contact support. If you do not have a support contract, please use the forums to list your complaint.

whitelist.label: Whitelisted
whitelist.tooltip: This IP is permanently whitelisted and can’t be blocked.

info.unknownMacAddress: {{macAddress}} does not match any devices in your account's list!

success.restart: You successfully sent a Restart request to this device!

confirm.deleteDevice: Are you sure you want to delete that device from the Provisioner?

generateFiles.text: Your settings are about to be updated. Do you want to generate the corresponding files?
